channel.title: ARENA FIGHT
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "ARENA FIGHT" - CHUUNIN vs ROOT ???

item.title: Re: ARENA FIGHT
item.content:encoded:
No bug. You've got a 75-90ish% chance of fighting someone of your rank and season, the other 25-10ish% is anyone's game. There's also the 11DBHK, who everyone has an equal chance of meeting.

Otherwise you can screw yourself by speedlooping to some absurd season like 30 without the corresponding power to back it up and never win a match until you loop (if even then). Since you need to win matches to get Doughman (who is required for some high level content), you have to be able to win matches, regardless of how expensive it might turn out to be.

item.title: Re: ARENA FIGHT
item.content:encoded: it is NOT a bug. sometimes it happens, most of the players are jonin+ rank as is. i mean there are people that are over level 110 that are still sannin so i would advise that you just keep trying. (outside of DH for now since that's when most of the harder fights take place)

item.title: ARENA FIGHT
item.content:encoded:
Are we sure Chuunin Lv. versus Root Lv is not a bug ???

tq
